tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE journalists (
  journalist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  journalist_name VARCHAR(255),
  contact_info VARCHAR(255),
  beats VARCHAR(255),
  article_links TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE contact_information (
    contact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    journalist_id INT,
    contact_type VARCHAR(50),
    contact_value VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (journalist_id) REFERENCES journalists(journalist_id)
);

CREATE TABLE article_links (
    article_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    article_title VARCHAR(255),
    article_link VARCHAR(255),
    journalist_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (journalist_id) REFERENCES journalists(journalist_id)
);

CREATE TABLE contact_information (
  journalist_id INT,
  address TEXT,
  city TEXT,
  state TEXT,
  postal_code TEXT,
  PRIMARY KEY (journalist_id)
);

CREATE TABLE articles (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title TEXT,
  content TEXT,
  journalist_id INT,
  beat_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (journalist_id) REFERENCES journalists(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (beat_id) REFERENCES beats(id)
);
